result.title: Problems with range updates and query
result.content:
Hello CF community,

I have a problem and I don't know how to solve it. Some time back, I took help from some amazing people on codeforces for a problem about finding frequency of a number in a range from l to r. The blog for the same is this â€” http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/52578

I was wondering about how can we solve the same problem given we have to keep an eye on updates also this time. The updates are basically range updates (adding x from l to r).
